long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes all the paragraph text in any Breitbart article, and replaces it with a significant chunk of the script from the 2007 animated film, the Bee Movie. It also goes and puts "uwu" and the beginning and end of divs, such that any page becomes an chaotic mess. Some images are replaced entirely with the image of Trump's Four Seasons news conference. The point of this is to make Breitbart borderline incomprehensible, and/or throw off your relatives.
